eu.focusnet.app.ui

Class FocusApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • eu.focusnet.app.ui.FocusApplication

  • public class FocusApplication
extends Application
    FOCUS Application

    This is the entry point of our application and direct subclass of the default Android Application object.

    In this class, we override the default behavior by: - Defining a custom error reporting system (ACRA) - Defining a custom Activity handler used to

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler originalUncaughtExceptionHandler
      We override the handler for uncaught exceptions and this variable will hold a reference to the original one (actually ACRA's one, see attachBaseContext(Context), as we also use it.

    • Method Detail

      • reportError

        public static void reportError(java.lang.Exception e)
        This function triggers a silent ACRA report to the reporting server.

        This is used when we think we have somehow end up in a strange/crashed state, but we were still able to recover. We however want to inspect the reasons of this state and therefore expect to receive a bug report.

        This also allows us to send reports even if no exception is triggered. We may for example monitor the application performance and send a report if it is too slow, for knowing what happens.

        Parameters:
        e - The exception to be transmitted on the remote reporting server.

      • attachBaseContext

        protected void attachBaseContext(Context base)
        Attach the base Context

        This implementation does: - Enable MultiDex - Enable ACRA when not in DEBUG build mode - Register a custom uncaught exception handler

        Parameters:
        base - inherited parameter

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()
        Perform operations when creating the Application

        This is called after attachBaseContext(). We do the following: - Register a custom activity handler that will help us keep track of the currently active Activity - Enable debugging checks in DEBUG build mode - Setup our DataManager and CronService
